title: STEM Language Competency Enhancement Course Focused on Renewable Energy Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic STEM concept comprehension, fundamental smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: A course where in-service elementary teachers acquire STEM-integrated language pedagogy through renewable energy themes, conducted via mobile devices in limited technological environments

learning_goals: Achievement of the ability to design context-based STEM lessons using renewable energy examples (90% or higher).
20% improvement according to the Scientific Creativity Scale (SCS).
25% increase in STEM career interest measured by the STEM-CIS.
Completion rate of 10-minute microlearning content in mobile environments reaches 80% or higher.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
